pages.text: The cachalot Whale is a neutral, massive mammal mod found in lukewarm, cold and deep oceans. They detect their preys, Squids sending  out a moaning noise to echolocate them.$(br2)During thunderstoms, Cachalot Whales may spawn washed up on beaches. If you pushed back into the water without hurt them, they may reward youwith an Ambergris.
You can use it to craft an Echolocator and upgrade it to an Endolocator
